node.name: Condenser USB microphone kit MAKE: FIFINE MODEL: T669
node.description: With plug-and-play connection through USB, double pop filter before microphone and wide frequency response, it can easily handle high sound pressure levels to reduce distortion. The adjustable arm of microphone kit has reach of 2.5 feet and table-hugging design offer no facial obstruction at performance which generally has the problem with other recording devices.  (SIZE: 400mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 700 grams)
node.content: In recent years USB ports are preferred over audio jack(3.5mm) for any audio input/output because of better signal conversion and also compatibility with number of devices like ADC(Analog-to-Digital-Conversion) & DAC(Digital-to-Analog-Conversion) / With adjustable gain, microphone of this setup sends signal through inbuilt mixer where level of noise are splits and unwanted pattern like echo, muttering are discarded / It has double pop filter as well, to discard initial unwanted breathing noise completely / With scissor arm which can elongate to 2.5 feet and c-clamp to fix the setup in any narrow edges, it is quiet handy to use and comes with 1 year warranty / Although software is not suggested to use but some users shared a good experience with software & this microphone kit.
node.alt: Fifine T669 Condenser USB Microphone Kit with Adjustable Scissor Arm Stand Shock Mount for PC and MAC Only (Does not work with Mobile)

The adjustable arm of microphone kit has reach of 2.5 feet and table-hugging design offer no facial obstruction at performance which generally has the problem with other recording devices.  (SIZE: 400mm extension clamp / WEIGHT: 700 grams)
